title: Tofu, cucumber and tomato salad
ingredients: ['1 tomato, chopped', '1 cucumber, seeded and chopped', '1/2 red onion, thinly sliced', '1 (400g) tin kidney beans, drained', '100g (4 oz) firm tofu, diced', 'handful chopped fresh basil', '4 tablespoons salad dressing of choice', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
